abstract: The president of Toyota Motor Company is expected to step aside next year and could be succeeded by Akio Toyoda, the grandson of the auto company’s founder.
snippet: The president of Toyota Motor Company is expected to step aside next year and could be succeeded by Akio Toyoda, the grandson of the auto company’s founder.
lead_paragraph: DETROIT  Facing its worst year in decades, and with no sign of a global recovery in sight, Toyota Motor is set to make a change in top management next year, people with knowledge of the plans said Tuesday.

headline.main: New Leader Expected at Toyota Next Year
headline.print_headline: New Leader Expected At Toyota Next Year
